title.rendered: Harrison Carloss adds more talent to its digital line-up

content.rendered:
Harrison Carloss, the strategic creative agency with over 40 years of successful marketing know-how to its name, has boosted its digital and creative design team with the addition of some fresh new talent.

 

Chelsea joins the agency as a front end developer, while Chris brings with him digital design skills.

 

Following a year’s web design at one of the UK&I’s largest technology distribution and specialist service providers, Chelsea was lead digital designer at Staffordshire University. She then spent 18 months as a front end web developer working on websites, SEO, DMS, lead management and online sales software.

 

Before joining HC, and following a 1st class honours design degree at Staffordshire University, Chris won a young super yacht designer award in 2018. He then did design work on yachts in Falmouth, and subsequently worked in a design and project management role in the Midlands.

 

The addition of Chelsea and Chris further strengthens the agency’s in-house creative, web and digital capabilities, and augments an already impressive team of designers, developers, inventors, strategists, artists and storytellers.

 

As Staffordshire’s oldest established and longest running creative agency, Harrison Carloss are renowned for producing a long series of highly successful campaigns for many well-known global, national and regional brands, gathering many awards and achievements along the way.

 

Over the last 18 months Harrison Carloss has enjoyed an extraordinary period of expansion that has seen significant growth in the agency’s client list, together with an increase in the digital side of the business.

 

We are very pleased to say that the agency has weathered the Covid-19 storm remarkably well and, true to form, we have been supporting clients and businesses with a a full range of marketing services which include web design, branding and marketing strategy, direct mail, advertising, design for print and print management.

 

Said Harrison Carloss MD Adam Mobley, “We’re absolutely delighted to welcome Chelsea and Chris to our highly talented team. I’ve no doubt that with their abilities we can build on our achievements over the past 18  months, and continue to deliver the very best for our existing and new clients.”

 

Interested in joining the team?

We’re an innovative and creative gang, passionate about launching and growing brands. Check out our vacancies page for the latest roles at Harrison Carloss.
